name: DORIAN
description:
Dorian, the unicorn corgi is the beloved dog in Lost Autumn has woken up to find that the courier was supposed to deliver pumpkins for the pumpkin festival, but hasn't been seen in a long time. With the aid of a magical girl, Dorian goes on an adventure with the mission to find out what's happening... but who knows what awaits you outside of the gate?

Controls:
WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
Space (Hold) - Charge

My entry for the 3rd VimJam!
